response.overview: In the rural Midwest, brothers Connor and Gage are trapped in a cycle of petty crime and poor decisions. Gage, reckless and without aim, drags his younger brother along, despite Connor's desire for a way out and dream of becoming a musician. After a failed theft, Gage destroys Connor's guitar and convinces him to commit another crime to replace it. The heist goes wrong, leaving Connor injured and their already strained relationship at a breaking point.
response.title: Sunburst
